ecommerce.title: E-commerce Website: Carpento
ecommerce.description: Selling furniture online, from showcasing the products, browsing the details to finishing the checkout flow.
key-points: Developed with React, CRA, Bootstrap, consisting of ~8,500 lines of well-structured source code.
Integrated with 20+ APIs, GET, POST, DELETE, and PUT to modify product and shopping cart states...etc.
Follow modular principles, including reusable component system, maintainable SCSS styling, and a clean file architecture for maintainability.
10+ reusable components and custom hooks, reduced 18% total lines of codes, enhanced code readability and maintainability.
Consolidate packages including Swiper, CKEditor, React Hook Form, enhance the readability and maintainability, also improved user experience.
